data.DescriptionHtml:
You mutter the ancient words, and your hands glow yellow where they touch the stone. Where you touch, the stone seems as soft as clay.

This spell functions like stone shape (PH 284), except that it affects a much larger quantity of stone.
data.Name: Stone Shape, Greater
data.Target: Stone or stone objects touched, up to 10 cu. ft. + 10 cu. ft./ level
